tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE location_data (
    location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    visit_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE visits (
    visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    visit_date DATE,
    visit_time TIME,
    visitor_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE Locations ( location_id INT PRIMARY KEY, location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL, longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Customers ( customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE Visits ( visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT NOT NULL, location_id INT NOT NULL, visit_date DATE NOT NULL, visit_time TIME NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id), FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id) );
CREATE TABLE GeofencedAreas ( area_id INT PRIMARY KEY, area_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, center_latitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL, center_longitude DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL, radius DECIMAL(9,6) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE VisitsAnalytics ( analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY, visit_id INT NOT NULL, area_id INT NOT NULL, dwell_time INT NOT NULL, exit_time TIME NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (visit_id) REFERENCES Visits(visit_id), FOREIGN KEY (area_id) REFERENCES GeofencedAreas(area_id) );
